description: Tiger team pitch work focused on acquiring a new partner within financial services.

sections.title: BACKGROUND
sections.text: In an effort to gain The Wall Street Journal as a client, myself and another designer were tasked with putting together mocks for a pitch. In just 48 hours, we created a distinct brand identity and a specialized hub labeled WSJ | Concierge that hosted financial editorial. These mocks were used as a live prototype during the pitch that ultimately led to a partnership.
